metadata.description: Comprehensive reference for AWS Athena/Trino SQL functions optimized for LLM validation

functions.name: chr
functions.description: Returns Unicode code point as character.

functions.name: codepoint
functions.description: Returns Unicode code point of character.

functions.name: split_part
functions.description: Returns part at index after split.

functions.name: starts_with
functions.description: Tests if string starts with substring.

functions.name: count_if
functions.description: Counts rows where condition is true.

functions.name: bool_and
functions.description: Returns true if all values are true.

functions.name: bool_or
functions.description: Returns true if any value is true.

functions.name: rank
functions.example: SELECT rank() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC);

functions.name: dense_rank
functions.example: SELECT dense_rank() OVER (ORDER BY score DESC);

functions.name: wilson_interval_lower
functions.description: Lower bound of Wilson score interval.

functions.name: wilson_interval_upper
functions.description: Upper bound of Wilson score interval.

functions.name: array_except
functions.description: Returns elements in array1 not in array2.

functions.name: arrays_overlap
functions.description: Tests if arrays have common elements.

functions.name: flatten
functions.description: Flattens nested array by one level.

functions.name: repeat
functions.description: Creates array with element repeated count times.

functions.name: zip
functions.description: Merges arrays into array of rows.

functions.name: all_match
functions.description: Tests if all elements match predicate.

functions.name: any_match
functions.description: Tests if any element matches predicate.

functions.name: none_match
functions.description: Tests if no elements match predicate.

functions.name: array_has_duplicates
functions.description: Tests if array has duplicate elements.

functions.name: map
functions.description: Creates map from key and value arrays.

functions.name: map_from_entries
functions.description: Creates map from array of key-value pairs.

functions.name: is_json_scalar
functions.description: Tests if JSON is a scalar.

functions.name: json_array_contains
functions.description: Tests if JSON array contains value.

functions.name: json_array_get
functions.description: Returns JSON array element at index.

functions.name: json_extract_scalar
functions.description: Extracts JSON scalar value as string.

functions.name: json_table
functions.example: SELECT * FROM json_table('[{"a":1}]', 'lax $[*]' COLUMNS(a INT PATH 'lax $.a'));

functions.name: ST_Within
functions.description: Tests if geometry1 is within geometry2.

functions.name: nullif
functions.description: Returns null if values are equal.

functions.name: try
functions.description: Returns null on error instead of failing.

functions.name: try_cast
functions.description: Casts value, returns null on failure.

functions.name: try_cast
functions.description: Safely casts, returns null on failure.

functions.name: parse_presto_data_size
functions.description: Parses data size string to bytes.

functions.name: typeof
functions.description: Returns the type name of expression.

functions.name: ST_GeomFromBinary
functions.description: Returns geometry from WKB or EWKB representation.

functions.name: geometry_from_hadoop_shape
functions.description: Returns geometry from Spatial Framework for Hadoop representation.

functions.name: ST_LineString
functions.description: Returns LineString from array of points.

functions.name: ST_MultiPoint
functions.description: Returns MultiPoint geometry from array of points.

functions.name: to_spherical_geography
functions.description: Converts Geometry to SphericalGeography on Earth's sphere.

functions.name: ST_Crosses
functions.description: Tests if geometries have some but not all interior points in common.

functions.name: ST_Disjoint
functions.description: Tests if geometries do not spatially intersect.

functions.name: ST_Equals
functions.description: Tests if geometries represent the same geometry.

functions.name: ST_Overlaps
functions.description: Tests if geometries share space, same dimension, not completely contained.

functions.name: ST_Relate
functions.description: Tests if first geometry is spatially related to second.

functions.name: ST_Touches
functions.description: Tests if geometries have at least one point in common but interiors don't intersect.

functions.name: geometry_nearest_points
functions.description: Returns points on each geometry nearest to the other.

functions.name: geometry_union
functions.description: Returns geometry representing point set union of input geometries.

functions.name: ST_Boundary
functions.description: Returns closure of combinatorial boundary of geometry.

functions.name: ST_Difference
functions.description: Returns geometry representing point set difference.

functions.name: ST_EnvelopeAsPts
functions.description: Returns array of two points: lower left and upper right corners of bounding box.

functions.name: ST_ExteriorRing
functions.description: Returns line string representing exterior ring of polygon.

functions.name: ST_Intersection
functions.description: Returns geometry representing point set intersection.

functions.name: ST_SymDifference
functions.description: Returns geometry representing point set symmetric difference.

functions.name: ST_Union
functions.description: Returns geometry representing point set union.

functions.name: ST_ConvexHull
functions.description: Returns minimum convex geometry that encloses all input geometries.

functions.name: ST_GeometryN
functions.description: Returns geometry element at given index (1-indexed).

functions.name: ST_InteriorRingN
functions.description: Returns interior ring element at specified index.

functions.name: ST_IsClosed
functions.description: Tests if linestring's start and end points are coincident.

functions.name: ST_IsSimple
functions.description: Tests if geometry has no anomalous geometric points like self-intersection.

functions.name: ST_IsRing
functions.description: Tests if line is closed and simple.

functions.name: ST_Length
functions.description: Returns length of linestring using Euclidean measurement.

functions.name: ST_PointN
functions.description: Returns vertex of linestring at given index (1-indexed).

functions.name: ST_Points
functions.description: Returns array of points in linestring.

functions.name: ST_XMax
functions.description: Returns X maxima of bounding box.

functions.name: ST_YMax
functions.description: Returns Y maxima of bounding box.

functions.name: ST_XMin
functions.description: Returns X minima of bounding box.

functions.name: ST_YMin
functions.description: Returns Y minima of bounding box.

functions.name: simplify_geometry
functions.description: Returns simplified version using Douglas-Peucker algorithm.

functions.name: ST_InteriorRings
functions.description: Returns array of all interior rings in polygon.

functions.name: ST_NumGeometries
functions.description: Returns number of geometries in collection.

functions.name: ST_Geometries
functions.description: Returns array of geometries in collection.

functions.name: ST_NumPoints
functions.description: Returns number of points in geometry.

functions.name: ST_NumInteriorRing
functions.description: Returns cardinality of interior rings collection.

functions.name: line_interpolate_point
functions.description: Returns Point interpolated along LineString at given fraction.

functions.name: line_interpolate_points
functions.description: Returns array of Points interpolated along LineString.

functions.name: line_locate_point
functions.description: Returns fraction representing location of closest point on LineString.

functions.name: geometry_invalid_reason
functions.description: Returns reason why geometry is not valid.

functions.name: great_circle_distance
functions.description: Returns great-circle distance between two points on Earth in kilometers.

functions.name: from_geojson_geometry
functions.description: Returns spherical geography from GeoJSON representation.

functions.name: convex_hull_agg
functions.description: Returns minimum convex geometry enclosing all input geometries.

functions.name: bing_tile
functions.description: Creates Bing tile from XY coordinates and zoom level.

functions.name: bing_tile_at
functions.description: Returns Bing tile at zoom level containing given point.

functions.name: bing_tiles_around
functions.description: Returns minimum set of Bing tiles covering circle around point.

functions.name: bing_tile_coordinates
functions.description: Returns XY coordinates of Bing tile.

functions.name: bing_tile_polygon
functions.description: Returns polygon representation of Bing tile.

functions.name: bing_tile_zoom_level
functions.description: Returns zoom level of Bing tile.

functions.name: geometry_to_bing_tiles
functions.description: Returns minimum set of Bing tiles that fully covers geometry.

functions.name: to_encoded_polyline
functions.description: Encodes linestring or multipoint to polyline.

functions.name: approx_distinct
functions.description: Returns approximate number of distinct input values using HyperLogLog.

functions.name: approx_distinct
functions.description: Returns approximate distinct count with specified standard error (0.0040625 to 0.26).

functions.name: quantile_at_value
functions.description: Returns approximate quantile number between 0 and 1 from quantile digest given input value.

functions.name: values_at_quantiles
functions.description: Returns approximate percentile values as array given quantile digest and quantiles array.

functions.name: make_set_digest
functions.description: Composes all input values into a setdigest for MinHash similarity estimation.

functions.name: merge_set_digest
functions.description: Returns setdigest of aggregate union of individual setdigest structures.

functions.name: intersection_cardinality
functions.description: Returns estimation for cardinality of intersection of two set digests.

functions.name: jaccard_index
functions.description: Returns Jaccard similarity coefficient estimation between two set digests.

functions.name: values_at_quantiles
functions.description: Returns approximate percentile values as array from T-digest and quantiles array.

functions.name: index
functions.description: Teradata-compatible alias for strpos function returning position of substring.

functions.name: char2hexint
functions.description: Returns hexadecimal representation of UTF-16BE encoding of string.

functions.name: soundex
functions.description: Returns phonetic representation of string using Soundex algorithm.
